import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { deleteGoal } from '../components/features/goals/goalSlice' import CalendarComp from './Timer' import DateRangePickerComp from './DateRangePickerComp' import Timer from './Timer' function GoalItem({ goal }) { const dispatch = useDispatch() return (
{new Date(goal.createdAt).toLocaleString('en-US')}

Habit: {goal.text}

{goal.days} Days

React date selection

) } export default GoalItem
